rules: Rule1: If the active ingredient is ordered, then it is received.
Rule2: Whenever the active ingredient is shipped, it is delivered.
Rule3: Under the condition that the active ingredient is requested, it is ordered.
Rule4: Either the active ingredient is requested or it is procured.
Rule5: Provided that the active ingredient is procured, it is shipped.
Rule6: If the manufacturing line is contaminated, then it is not sterilized.
Rule7: If the active ingredient is tested, then if the quality standards are not compliant, the raw material is not approved.
Rule8: Under the condition that the finished product is labeled, the quality standards are compliant.
Rule9: Whenever the finished product is marked, the quality standards are compliant.
Rule10: If the finished product is approved, then either it is inspected, or it is labeled, or it is marked.
Rule11: Under the condition that the finished product is recalled, it is destroyed.
Rule12: Either the finished product is sampled or it is tested.
Rule13: Whenever the finished product is tested, it is labeled or it is marked.
Rule14: If the active ingredient is analyzed, then if the quality standards are not compliant, the raw material is not approved.
Rule15: If the defect is identified, then if the finished product is flawed, it is not defective.
Rule16: The defect is identified or it is detected.
Rule17: The defect is reported, or if the defect is detected, then if the finished product is flawed, it is not defective.
Rule18: Either the defect is critical or the finished product is approved.
Rule19: If the defect is documented, then it is logged.
Rule20: Provided that the defect is investigated, if the defect is logged, then if the defect is minor, it is not critical.
Rule21: If the drug product is manufactured, then it is packaged.
Rule22: Under the condition that the drug product is manufactured, it is not packaged.
Rule23: Either the drug product is manufactured, or the active ingredient is tested, or the active ingredient is analyzed.
Rule24: Whenever the active ingredient is transported, if it is stored, then the quality standards are compliant.
Rule25: Under the condition that the active ingredient is delivered, it is transported.
Rule26: If it is not the case that if the manufacturing line is contaminated then it is sterilized, then the manufacturing line is quarantined.
Rule27: If it is not the case that if the manufacturing line is contaminated then it is sterilized, then the manufacturing line is not quarantined.
Rule28: If it is not the case that the finished product is inspected or it is labeled or it is marked, then the finished product is defective.
Rule29: Under the condition that it is not the case that the finished product is inspected or it is labeled or it is marked, the finished product is flawed.
Rule30: If it is not the case that if the finished product is released then it is approved, then the finished product is recalled.
Rule31: Provided that it is not the case that if the finished product is sampled then it is inspected, the finished product is rejected.

Rule32: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the quality standards are not compliant then the raw material is validated, then the raw material is certified, then the raw material is not released, then the manufacturing line is contaminated.

Rule33: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the quality standards are not compliant then the raw material is validated, then the raw material is certified, then the raw material is released.
Rule34: Provided that it is not the case that if the quality standards are not compliant then the raw material is validated, the raw material is not certified.
Rule35: If the quality standards are not compliant, then the raw material is approved.
Rule36: If the quality standards are not compliant, then the raw material is not validated.
facts: Fact1: The finished product is released.
Fact5: The active ingredient is stored.
Fact6: The finished product is not inspected.
Fact7: The finished product is not destroyed.
Fact8: The finished product is not rejected.
Fact9: The defect is not reported.
Fact10: The active ingredient is not received.
